participant_1.name: Ethan Johnson
participant_1.personality: Confident and ambitious, Ethan is driven by success and the pursuit of excellence. He is also somewhat materialistic, enjoying the finer things in life.
participant_1.background: my parents are very wealthy bankers. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i grew up in manhattan. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Sophia Martinez
participant_2.personality: Resilient and motivational, Sophia has a positive outlook on life. She is empathetic and enjoys helping others reach their goals.
participant_2.background: i'm a cancer survivor. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach. i am a clean eater. my parents were both very athletic.
